channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-4973] UnreliableUdpTransportTest and MulticastTransportTest have test failures
item.description:
The testSendingMediumMessage and testSendingLargeMessage test cases fail for both of these as shown below.

UnreliableUdpTransportTest uses org.apache.activemq.transport.reliable.ReliableTransport, which is deprecated. Should we continue to run these tests?

-------------------------------------------------------
T E S T S
-------------------------------------------------------
Running org.apache.activemq.transport.multicast.MulticastTransportTest
Tests run: 3, Failures: 2, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 40.6 sec <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.activemq.transport.multicast.MulticastTransportTest

item.summary: UnreliableUdpTransportTest and MulticastTransportTest have test failures

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: We've deprecated the client side UdpTransport bits so we don't need to worry about these tests.
